column4: Manikpur - Bashbari Part 2 | Erosion of around 1300 mtr. had occurred w.e..f 17/06/2022 to 30/06/2022.Two (2) Nos of Relief camp opened due to the said erosion (1) Tilpukhuri ME Madrasa ,Male=179 Female=165 Child=124 Pregnant=1 Disability=1 Total=470(Latitude-26.39971 Longitude-90.753438) (2)3 no. Bashbari LP School, Male=86 Female=83 Child=77 Pregnant=2 Total=248(Latitude-26.426476 Longitude-90.759589) since 17.06.2022 to till date 01.07.2022/Bashbari no 2 Temp.Shelter, Male=55, Femele=45, Child=25,(Toatl=125,Latitude-26.4709483 Longitude-90.748884)Total Inmates 843. Medical Team- 2 Nos. date- 03.08.2022, Total Population-843. erosion continues to Bashbari par 2. 6nos house damage fully kaccha on 05.08.2022 | 0,  Srijangram - Tinkonia part I | Due to erosion w.e.f 02.08.2022 four nos. of families got affected at Tinkonia part I. The erosion has been taking place on river bank of Manas -Brahmaputra in a length of 1 km approximately. population affected:18 nos. | 18
Bengtal - Aminpara | Soil Erosion taking place on the R/B of river Champamati at village Aminpara measuring approximately Length-150m, Breadth-5m, Depth-3m since 03-08-2022 | 0

Rangia - Vill - Madhukuchi & Niz Hassang | Erosion is observed by the banks of river Puthimari for a stretch of about 350 meters as per report of JE, Water Resource Dept., Rangia on 04.08.2022. | 0,  Kamalpur - Downstream of Vill-Azara | Active Bank Erosion is observed due to swift current of the puthimari river and total length of erosion 200 m (approx) as per report of the AEE,WRD Rangia Sub-Division on 04-08-2022 | 0

Laharighat - Leruamukh and Borchapori | As per report of the Water Resources Dept on 05/08/2022, erosion is observed in areas like Leruamukh and Borchapori with maximum erosion of 3 m in Leruamukh & 3 m in Borchapori area. | 0

Kalaigaon - 1. East Rupatal, 2. Namjalah, 3. Makelikanda, 4. Tamaru | 1. Erosion occurred at village East Rupatal(Das Chuba) as reported on 05/08/2022 due to to heavy current of river Noa in the L/B of the river covering a length of 210 meters. Longitude:91.977097, Latitude: 26.618274. 2. Erosion occurred at village Namjalah as reported on 05/08/2022 due to heavy current of the river Noa in the L/B of the river covering a length of 210 meters. Longitude: 91.907103, Latitude: 26.623072. 3. Erosion occurred at village Makelikanda as reported on 05/08/2022 due to heavy current of river Kulshi in the R/B of the river covering a length of around 270 meters. Longitude: 91.939176, Latitude: 26.641863. 4. Erosion occurred at village Tamaru as reported on 05/08/2022 due to heavy current of the river Nonoi in the L/B of the river covering a length of 500 meters. Longitude: 91.900064, Latitude:26.608752 | 65
